## BrowserJsPlumbInstance.addDragFilter() method

Adds a filter to the list of filters used to determine whether or not a given event should start an element drag.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addDragFilter(filter: Function | string, exclude?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  filter | Function \| string | CSS3 selector, or function that takes an element and returns true/false |
|  exclude | boolean | If true, the filter is inverted: anything \_but\_ this value. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
